n: Grecian Green Beans in Tomato Sauce
des: "The tomato taste and seasonings are worth the time and effort. Try the sauce with okra, too. Enjoy!"
ins: Place the green beans in a pot, and mix in the lemon juice, onion, olive oil, tomatoes, tomato sauce, parsley, water, salt and pepper, and bay leaf. Cook 45 minutes over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until sauce is thickened. Remove bay leaf before serving.
